quest.name: Chimerical Abominations
journal: The Allagan research node is silently awaiting user interaction.

You learn that a number of rapidly reproducing, monstrous chimeras have escaped from an Allagan research facility. The research node explains that they pose a severe threat to the local environment and must be immediately terminated. Slay two Allagan chimeras.
You have slain the horrifying abominations. Inform the research node that the immediate risk to the environment has been ameliorated.

The research node acknowledges your work and confirms that the threat to the environment has been mitigated. You learn that all attempts at creating composite life-forms have resulted in dangerous and psychologically unstable creatures, but it does not seem that the Allagan research node has any intention of putting limitations on its research.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Transmission received from composite life-form research facility... <buzzzzzz> ...Congratulations. You have been selected to assist in a research experiment.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSYSTEM
dialogue.text: Sensors indicate escape by subjects in test chamber 167-Bâ”€accelerated chimera breeding program. Subjects present an extreme risk to the surrounding environment. Recommend immediate termination of associated Allagan chimeras.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSYSTEM
dialogue.text: To minimize irreparable damage to the local environment, please immediately terminate two Allagan chimeras.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Extermination of chimeras confirmed. Thank you for your service to the Allagan research program. Your satisfactory performance has been noted.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please be assured that, while all composite life-forms attempts to date have invariably been psychologically unstable and...<buzzzzzz>...research program will not waver in its pursuit of the noble goal of... <buzzzzzz>
